text: The HK4TUC (often just called the Four Trails) links the major trails in Hong Kong, starting on the first day of Lunar New Year. You can follow the GPS trackers, posted on the HK4TUCâ€™s official Facebook page. Runners complete the MacLehose Trail MacLehose, Wilson, Hong Kong and Lantau Trails all in reverse. In total, it is 298 kilometres and runners will ascend 14,500m of accumulative elevation. ==References== Category:Trails Category:Geography of Hong Kong
title: HK Four Trails Ultra Challenge
